page.title: 05Brownies.
page.content: On Tuesdays we go to{Brownies.}You have to be between 7 and 10 years old to be a{Brownie.}Only girls can join. The leader is called{Brown Owl.}She is helped by{Snowy Owl}and{Tawny Owl.}We meet at 6pm and go home at 7pm. First we make a fairy ring and sing "Will you come to{Brownies."}After that we play games like a Hunting We Will Go, Cat and Mouse or Alberts Picnic. Then we go into our sixes groups. These groups are called{Elves, Gnomes, Imps, {Pixies, Scottish Kelpies}etc.We work for interest badges like hostess, horse riding, safety in the home, swimming and lots of others. Once a year we go on{Brownie}pack holiday. This year we are going to Darley Dale. We go to a hostel and stay for 1 week. Our{uniform}is brown with a yellow tie. We have a silver promise badge.
